tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: One of the best quality in a person is to listen and respond appropriately. Dr. Avinash is one such person who'll listen to you and suggest the best possible treatment. He's been seeing our son since his birth, be it for general illnesses or his vaccination and I bet,we couldn't have found a better paediatrician than him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** ******* ******** ** ** ********* ************* He listens to the patient problem with patience and suggests the best treatment always. He does not suggest unnecessary Lab tests and antibiotics for the kids. I have visited him more than thrice in the last 6 months and he gave us the **** treatment every time.

tags: None
review:
Had an appointment, reached on time and even Doctor was available at the right time. Doctor is very friendly,He diagnosis with patience and answers all our queries. Prescribes medication with great care.
I strongly suggest people to go for subjected doctor in case of medical needs.

tags: None
review: Doctor was soft spoken, took time to discuss and examine the kid. Suggested mild medication.  Asked us the relavent questions and answered our queries to the point.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I would not recommend this doc for a video consultation based on my experience with him. I booked an appointment with him for my kid who was vomiting uncontrollably. He comes online at that time, says he has lot of patients queued up in his clinic, so he'd contact after 2 hours before going offline. I felt it was extremely unprofessional for a pediatrician to accept online consultation and change it in the last minute. Definitely not a good experience when you are worried about your kid and the doc doesn't even care !
reply_text: Hi Mr Narayan , I had many sick kids queued up in our clinic at that moment who were waiting since long time , I haven‚Äôt denied your appointment, i asked you to connect at 11:30 am instead of 10:45 am. I know what my profession is , even there were kids in my clinic with recurrent vomiting and loose stools.
